raw_body: FERNANDO – LION BONNIFACE (Bonny) – (Retired Senior Manager – Commercial Bank & Former Administrator St.Nicholas College,​ Negombo),​ beloved husband of Adel Leema,​ loving father of Priyanke (UK),​ father-in-law of Sharmane (UK),​ everloving grandfather of Shamika and Porshia (UK). Remains lie at No. 44,​ St. Jude’s Place,​ Taladuwa,​ Negombo. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on 03rd April 2024 for Service and Burial at Negombo Cemetery.022312
